items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this dress!!!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE this dress!! I opened the bag and put it on! No wrinkles, which is a plus. It is longer than I expected, and the v -neck is pretty deep (no biggie) the pattern is really pretty and the cut of the dress is so flattering especially for a body con. I did not have â€œspanxâ€ on underneath, when I took the pics. The draping of this dress and the cinched in waist with ruching make it very forgiving for any body type. Polyester fabric is kind of thin, but feels good on. A very modern look but kind of retro also. I purchased this to wear on an Alaskan cruise. I found that at $33 itâ€™s worth every penny. FYI I am 5â€™75, 139 lbs, built like a boyðŸ™„ðŸ”», broad shoulders, narrow hips and a waist that is non existent. I purchased the large but probably could have gotten a medium. Buy it, itâ€™s a winner!!!! Read more
items.author: missusms

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Birthday dress!
items.body: This dress fits perfectly. It's super sexy and comfortable. It has stretch and rouching in all the right places I didn't even need any undergarments. The color and style worked perfectly for a fall night out. Read more
items.author: D'Neen Ross

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Definite Hit!
items.body: I am very pleased with this dress. It is very colorful with all of its "fall-like hues", and it is very stretchy and comfortable, but that is not a bad thing. It fits in all of the right places. The only thing I will warn everyone about is, it has a "deep plunge" in the front; therefore, you might have to make some "minor adjustments" like I did by tacking it up in the front enough with thread (on the under-side and invisibly) to your desired stopping point to get your head through since it is a pull-on dress, so it will not be as revealing. Anyway, I highly recommend this dress for anyone to purchase to wear to any type of event (e.g., work or a special occasion). You will love it as I do. Read more
items.author: Sharon Anderson of KCMO

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering fit all occasion dress
items.body: I love the fit of this dress. The print of the material was flattering as well. The type of material was stretchy and not stiff like some of the similar dresses in this price range I tried. I would recommend it to those of us curvy girls who are looking for a flattering fit! Read more
items.author: Deb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and excellent fit!
items.body: Shipping was on time. Good quality material, color is just as seen on Amazon. The material is sort and feels good against my skin. The style is really classy. I wore the dress to a semi-formal dinner and received a lot of compliment especially on the style. The fit was perfect for me - XL Read more
items.author: AnnSarah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars size too big

items.body: Very nice dress and it fits very good on me. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-brown, Blue, Orange, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
